definition: fart/flatulence/nonsense/(usu. in the negative) what/(not) a damn thing

thigh/part of a whole/portion of a sum/(stock) share/strand of a thread/low-level administrative unit, translated as "section" or "department" etc, ranked below 科[ke1]/classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc/classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff/classifier for bands of people, gangs etc/classifier for sudden forceful actions
to pass water/to piss/to urinate/to wee wee
erhua variant of 屁眼[pi4 yan3]
to wipe one’s ass/(fig.) (coll.) to clean up sb else's mess
dog's leg/fig. one who follows a villain/henchman/hired thug
to hug stinky feet/(fig.) to bootlick
lit. whoever provides milk is your mother (idiom)/fig. to follow whoever is feeding you/to put one's loyalties where one's interests lie
to latch on to the rich and powerful
